text: The region of Dakhla-Oued ad Dahab is one of the 12 new regions of Morocco established by the territorial division of 2015. Its perimeter is the same as the former region of Oued ad Dahab ().It is the only one of the 16 old regions to be unchanged. Only the name changed. Its capital is Dakhla. This region lies on the disputed territory of Western Sahara.Most of the country doesn't recognize either the sovereignty of Morocco or the sovereignty of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic. Oued ad Dahab has 2 provinces: * Aousserd Province * Oued ad Dahab Province ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Regions of Africa Category:Geography of Morocco Category:Western Sahara
title: Dakhla-Oued ad Dahab
